name: HeroSection
layout: flex flex-col items-center justify-center text-center px-4 py-8
description: Hero section with headline, subheadline, and CTA button

components.name: HeroHeadline
components.description: Headline: Simplify Your Customer Relationships with Our All-in-One CRM Solution

components.name: HeroSubHeadline
components.description: Sub-headline: Empower your sales, marketing, and support teams with a single platform that drives growth and boosts customer satisfaction.

components.name: HeroCtaButton
components.description: CTA button: Get Started with a Free Trial

layout: grid gap-8 md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-4 px-4 py-8
